pages.text: Within Woodland Mansions lies some odd statues made of Wool in a shape of an Illager's head, a Chicken or a Cat. Many theories have risen from these oddities. Some believed them to be objects of worship, some believed that they are conduits to channel their magics.

After many studies and experimentation with Lapis Lazuli, you've finally found the answer to this riddle. These statues are used as a means of scrying, looking at different parts of the world through the eyes of other beings. The Illagers seems to be spying on others through the use of Chickens and Cats, perhaps there's a way to spy on them back.
Through the use of the Eye of Ender, you've found a way to spy on the Illagers back.

The fact that Illagers use these animals as a means of spying suddenly gave you an epiphany. It was through their eyes that the Illagers are able to decipher where those who gain their scorn are located, and what Village is to be raided.

With such connection, perhaps it is possible to find one of their mansions by scrying either a Chicken or a Cat. By having an Empty Map offhand, you managed to write down the location of a Woodland Mansion, however, you must be careful as you can either leave some remnant of your spying or an Evoker would spot your scrying!
